title: Amy Schumer sits on the toilet in snap of the exact moment she found out she was pregnant

Amy Schumer posted a hilarious throwback pic to Instagram of the exact moment she found out she was pregnant while sat on the toilet.

The actress and comedian posted a revealing photo of the special life moment when she found out she was expecting her now five-month-old son Gene Attell - and she looks very surprised.

Schumer, 38, is pictured in workout gear with an open mouth and confused look, as she's sat on her pal Jessica Seinfield's toilet while a pregnancy test can be seen on the sink corner.

The mum-of-one penned: "#tbt the day I found out I was pregnant in @jessseinfield bathroom."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty Images)

Jessica Seinfield joked in the comments: "And why Gene is actually MY son." on Amy's photo.

And this isn't the first time that Amy has shared a pregnancy related toilet post with her fans.

Back in May after the birth of Gene, Amy shared a photo while in hospital of a family member holding her new bundle of joy as Amy was sitting on the toilet in the background, still in her hospital gown.

(Image: amyschumer/Instagram)

The actress joked in her caption: "Milf alert 1 o'clock."

The Trainwreck star's Instagram is full of adorable snaps of baby Gene, including her most recent of the five-month-old asleep surrounded by a large blanket and snuggling a cuddly toy.

(Image: amyschumer/Instagram)

Another cute snap showed Gene wearing a red hair band and star print neck tie as he grumped at the camera.

Amy is a mum-of-one, but her love for Gene shows she is very proud to be a mum.

She recently responded back to Jessica Simpson's amazing seven stone weight loss in six months since giving birth to her third baby.

(Image: Instagram)

In an Instagram post, Schumer admitted she wasn't exactly keeping pace with Simpson's weight loss, and shared a photo of herself and current body post-pregnancy, making it clear she was very happy with her own.

The star wrote: "Ok Simpson! Well I’ve lost 10 pounds and 100 dollars to my sister playing poker," adding that she's in "no rush" to slim down and writing "give me my money back Kim," to her sister.
description: Comedian Amy Schumer reveals the exact moment she found out she was expecting while sitting on the toilet
